definition: according to what you have heard or read. SYN evidently.
example: But apparently he really likes his job.
persian: ظاهراً، بنابر آنچه شنیده شده یا خوانده‌اید. (مترادف: evidently)

definition: used to say that you think sth is probably true.
example: And presumably he earns a lot more working in London.
persian: احتمالاً، برای بیان اینکه فکر می‌کنید چیزی احتمالاً درست است.

definition: finally, when everything has been considered.
example: But ultimately I think he does it for his career.
persian: در نهایت، وقتی همه چیز در نظر گرفته شد.

definition: used when saying what you really think about sth. SYNS frankly, personally.
example: Well, to be perfectly honest, I think he's mad.
persian: صادقانه بگویم، برای بیان نظر واقعی خود در مورد چیزی. (مترادف: frankly, personally)

definition: used when giving information that you expect other people to know already or agree with. SYN clearly.
example: Yes, it's obviously not what we would choose.
persian: بدیهی است، برای ارائه اطلاعاتی که انتظار دارید دیگران از قبل بدانند یا با آن موافق باشند. (مترادف: clearly)

definition: used to say that sth is normal and not surprising. SYN of course.
example: You want to be able to spend time with your family, naturally.
persian: طبیعتاً، برای بیان اینکه چیزی عادی و غیرمنتظره نیست. (مترادف: of course)

definition: used when giving the most important fact. SYN essentially.
persian: اساساً، برای بیان مهم‌ترین واقعیت. (مترادف: essentially)

definition: almost. SYN virtually.
example: His career means practically everything to him.

definition: used to show that sth is surprising. SYNS oddly/curiously (enough).
example: But strangely enough, he wasn't all that ambitious.
persian: به اندازه کافی عجیب، برای نشان دادن اینکه چیزی تعجب‌آور است. (مترادف: oddly, curiously)

definition: = from the point of view of sales or profit. SYN financially.
example: Commercially, the film was a flop, but I really enjoyed it.
persian: از نظر تجاری، از دیدگاه فروش یا سود. (مترادف: financially)

definition: = according to past custom.
example: Traditionally it was men who went out to work, but that's changing.
persian: به طور سنتی، مطابق با آداب و رسوم گذشته.

definition: = if we are to act sensibly and with sound reasons. logical ADJ. logic N.
example: Logically, we should consult a lawyer if there is a legal problem.
persian: منطقاً، اگر قرار است عاقلانه و با دلایل محکم عمل کنیم.

definition: = from the point of view of making friends. social ADJ.
example: Socially, it's good for children to mix with other kids in a playgroup.
persian: از نظر اجتماعی، از دیدگاه دوست‌یابی و روابط.

definition: = if we are sensible about what can be achieved, we have to conclude that...
example: Realistically, people won't give up their cars unless public transport is greatly improved.
persian: واقع‌بینانه، اگر در مورد آنچه می‌توان به دست آورد منطقی باشیم، باید نتیجه بگیریم که...

definition: = according to the rules, or what we have been told. opp unofficially.
example: Officially, we can't go in until 10 a.m.
persian: رسماً، طبق قوانین یا آنچه به ما گفته شده است. (متضاد: unofficially)

definition: = as an additional effect or consequence. opp directly.
example: The changes aren't aimed at us, but we will be affected indirectly.
persian: به طور غیرمستقیم، به عنوان یک اثر یا پیامد اضافی. (متضاد: directly)

definition: = from the point of view of her technical skill. technical ADJ. technique N.
example: Technically her performance was very good.
persian: از نظر فنی، از دیدگاه مهارت فنی.

definition: = considering the effect on the body.
persian: از نظر فیزیکی، با در نظر گرفتن اثر بر بدن.

definition: = considering the effect on the mind.
persian: از نظر ذهنی/روانی، با در نظر گرفتن اثر بر ذهن.

definition: used to say that sth could possibly happen or be true, but is unlikely.
example: Theoretically we could still lose the championship.
persian: از لحاظ تئوری، برای بیان اینکه چیزی ممکن است اتفاق بیفتد یا درست باشد، اما بعید است.

word: as far as sth is concerned
definition: used to give facts or an opinion about an aspect of sth.
example: As far as money is concerned, we can manage.
persian: تا آنجا که به فلان چیز مربوط می‌شود، برای ارائه حقایق یا نظری در مورد جنبه‌ای از یک موضوع.

definition: 1 for a short time. 2 in a few words (he explained briefly).
example: I worked in the tax office briefly.
persian: ۱. به طور مختصر (برای مدت زمان کوتاه). ۲. در چند کلمه.

definition: for a long time; for all time (nothing lasts forever).
persian: برای همیشه، برای مدت طولانی؛ برای تمام زمان‌ها.

definition: completely and only (purely by chance). SYN simply.
example: She said she did it purely to get experience.

definition: exactly and completely (also used to emphasize that sth must happen in all circumstances: Smoking in the lift is strictly prohibited.).
persian: دقیقاً و کاملاً (همچنین برای تأکید بر لزوم وقوع چیزی در همه شرایط: اکیداً ممنوع).

definition: just; only (also, absolutely: He was simply brilliant.).
persian: فقط؛ صرفاً (همچنین، به طور مطلق: به سادگی درخشان بود).

definition: to the same degree (also used to introduce a second point which is as important as the first).
persian: به طور مساوی، به یک اندازه (همچنین برای معرفی نکته دومی که به همان اندازه مهم است).

definition: exactly and correctly (also used to emphasize that sth is very true or obvious: He's very young: that's precisely why he needs my help.).
example: I don't know precisely how it happened.
persian: دقیقاً و درست (همچنین برای تأکید بر اینکه چیزی بسیار درست یا واضح است: دقیقاً).

definition: sincerely (also used to emphasize a particular quality: a truly remarkable man).
example: but I could see she was truly sorry about it.
persian: واقعاً، صمیمانه (همچنین برای تأکید بر یک کیفیت خاص: یک مرد واقعاً قابل توجه).

definition: used to emphasize that sth is always true or always happens.
persian: همیشه، مرتباً، برای تأکید بر اینکه چیزی همیشه درست است یا همیشه اتفاق می‌افتد.

definition: mainly. SYNS chiefly, predominantly.
persian: عمدتاً، در درجه اول. (مترادف: chiefly, predominantly)

definition: fairly; quite (can be used after a verb or before an adjective).
persian: تا حدودی، نسبتاً (می‌تواند بعد از فعل یا قبل از صفت استفاده شود).

definition: to a fairly large degree in comparison with sth else.
persian: نسبتاً، تا حد زیادی در مقایسه با چیز دیگری.

definition: INF (of a person) quite old.
example: My neighbour's getting on a bit.
persian: سن و سالی ازش گذشته (غیررسمی، برای فرد) نسبتاً پیر.

definition: having poor eyesight.
unable to hear very well.
persian: سنگین‌گوش، کسی که به سختی می‌شنود.

definition: die. SYN pass on.
kill a sick or injured animal with drugs so that it dies without pain. SYN put sth down.
example: she had to have her cat put to sleep.
persian: حیوان بیمار یا مجروح را خواباندن (کشتن بدون درد).

definition: the dismissing of employees to reduce costs. downsize v.
example: There's more talk of downsizing at work.
persian: کاهش نیروی کار (تعدیل نیرو) برای کاهش هزینه‌ها.

definition: dismiss sb or make them redundant.
persian: اخراج کردن کسی یا مرخص کردن او (به دلیل کاهش نیرو).

definition: a way of saying that sb is unintelligent (also not exactly clever/practical, etc.).
persian: خیلی باهوش نیست (روشی غیرمستقیم برای گفتن اینکه کسی کودن است).

definition: DISAPPROVING steal sth.
example: I've seen him helping himself to the office stationery.
persian: دست درازی کردن به چیزی، چیزی را دزدیدن (با لحن ناپسند).

definition: If sb is killed or injured by friendly fire, they are hit by a bomb or weapon fired by their own side.
example: injured during a friendly fire incident.
persian: آتش خودی، هدف قرار گرفتن توسط بمب یا سلاح شلیک شده توسط نیروهای خودی.

definition: death or injury to ordinary citizens, and possibly damage to buildings as well, during the course of a war.
persian: خسارت جانبی، مرگ یا جراحت شهروندان عادی و آسیب احتمالی به ساختمان‌ها در طول جنگ.

definition: Adjective form related to addiction.
Noun form meaning being dependent on something.
example: Drug addiction is a serious issue.

definition: Adjective form meaning extra.
Noun form meaning an extra thing or person.
example: The new wing is a great addition.

definition: Feeling isolated or estranged.
The state of being isolated.
Adjective meaning not identified by name.
The state of being anonymous.
Having a pleasant and distinctive smell.
A distinctive, typically pleasant smell.
example: The aroma of coffee filled the air.

definition: Paying close attention to something.
example: The student was attentive in class.

definition: The act or state of applying the mind to something.
The state of being deprived of a loved one by death.
persian: داغداری، مصیبت از دست دادن عزیز

definition: Adjective meaning deprived of a loved one.
example: The bereaved family held a service.

definition: Adjective meaning unsharpened or direct/straightforward.
example: She was blunt in her assessment.

definition: The quality of being blunt or direct.
In a state of complete confusion and disorder.
Complete disorder and confusion.
Able to exist or occur together without conflict.
example: The software is compatible with Mac.

definition: A state in which two things can exist together.
example: They tested the compatibility of the devices.

definition: Giving a lot of information clearly and in a few words; brief.
The quality of being concise.
Wilfully causing pain or suffering to others.
Cruel behaviour or attitudes.
Careful and circumspect in one's speech or actions.
The quality of behaving in such a way as to avoid causing offence or revealing private information.
Unable to concentrate because one's mind is preoccupied.
example: She was too distracted to work.

definition: A thing that prevents someone from concentrating.
Feeling or expressing overwhelming happiness or joyful excitement.
example: He was ecstatic about the news.

definition: An overwhelming feeling of great joy or excitement.
example: She was in a state of ecstasy.

definition: Ecstatically happy.
example: The team was elated after the win.

definition: Great happiness and exhilaration.
example: They felt a sense of elation.

definition: Loyal, constant, and steadfast.
Complete trust or confidence in someone or something.
example: I have faith in her abilities.

definition: Well known from long or close association.
Close acquaintance with or knowledge of something.
example: I gained familiarity with the language.

definition: Easily set on fire.
example: Flammable liquids must be stored safely.

definition: A hot, glowing body of burning gas.
Affected by uncontrolled extreme emotion.
example: She became hysterical and started screaming.

definition: Exaggerated or uncontrolled emotion or excitement.
example: The crowd was overcome with hysteria.

definition: Feeling or expressing great triumph and joy.
example: The fans were jubilant after the win.

definition: A feeling of great happiness and triumph.
example: The announcement was met with jubilation.

definition: Not supporting either side in a conflict.
example: I remained neutral in the argument.

definition: The state of not supporting or helping either side.
example: Switzerland is famous for its neutrality.

definition: Conforming to a standard; typical.
The state of being normal.
example: We hope for a return to normality.

definition: Famous or well known, typically for some bad quality or deed.
The state of being famous or well known for some bad quality.
Adjective meaning naked.
The state of being nude.
Exact, accurate, and careful about details.
The quality, condition, or fact of being exact and accurate.
example: The work was done with precision.

definition: Corresponding in size or degree.
example: The punishment was proportionate to the crime.

definition: A part, share, or number considered in comparative relation to a whole.
example: The proportion of women in the workforce is rising.

definition: Having or showing no pity or compassion for others.
The quality of being ruthless.
Causing public outrage by a perceived offence against morality or law.
An action or event regarded as morally or legally wrong and causing public outrage.
example: The politician was involved in a scandal.

definition: Inclined to conceal feelings and intentions.
example: He is a very secretive person.

definition: The action of keeping something secret.
example: The talks were held in secrecy.

definition: Relating to or characteristic of a snob.
The quality of being a snob.
example: I dislike snobbery in all its forms.

definition: Relating to or affecting the human spirit or soul.
The nonphysical part of a person.
Prepared to obey others unquestioningly.
example: He was subservient to his boss.

definition: The state of being subservient.
So delicate or precise as to be difficult to analyse or describe.
example: There was a subtle difference in flavour.

definition: The quality or state of being subtle.
example: The subtlety of his argument was impressive.

definition: Allowing light to pass through so that objects behind can be distinctly seen.
The condition of being transparent.
Of little value or importance.
The quality of being trivial.
Able to be seen.
The state of being visible.
example: Visibility was poor due to fog.

definition: Evil or morally wrong.
The quality of being wicked.
Verb meaning achieve or complete successfully.
Noun meaning something that has been achieved successfully.
example: The award recognizes his lifetime accomplishment.

definition: Verb meaning buy or obtain.
Noun meaning an asset or object bought or obtained.
example: The company announced a new acquisition.

definition: Verb meaning distribute (resources or duties) for a particular purpose.
example: They allocated funds for the project.

definition: Noun meaning the action or process of allocating.
example: We received our allocation of resources.

definition: Verb meaning produce (a list, book, or report) by assembling information.
Noun meaning the action or process of compiling.
example: This album is a compilation of old hits.

definition: Verb meaning meet (someone) face to face with hostile or argumentative intent.
example: She decided to confront her accuser.

definition: Noun meaning a hostile or argumentative meeting or situation.
Verb meaning give (something) in order to help achieve or provide something.
example: Everyone should contribute to the discussion.

definition: Noun meaning the part played by a person or thing in bringing about a result.
Verb meaning abandon (a person, cause, or country).
Noun meaning the action of abandoning a person, cause, or military duty.
Verb meaning keep (someone) in official custody.
Noun meaning the action of detaining someone or the state of being detained.
example: He spent two days in detention.

definition: Verb meaning discover or identify the presence or existence of (something).
Noun meaning the action or process of detecting something.
example: The detection of crime is difficult.

definition: Verb meaning pull or twist out of shape; give a misleading account of.
persian: تحریف کردن، کج و معوج کردن

definition: Noun meaning the action of distorting or the state of being distorted.
example: His account was full of distortion.

definition: Verb meaning cause (someone or something) to change course or turn from one direction to another.
Noun meaning the action of diverting or turning aside.
example: The road closure created a diversion.

definition: Verb meaning begin (a course of action, especially one that is important or arduous).
example: They embarked on a new project.

definition: Noun meaning the process of embarking.
Verb meaning force (a unwelcome duty or tax) on someone.
example: The government imposed a new tax.

definition: Noun meaning the action of imposing a new rule or requirement.
Verb meaning allow oneself to enjoy the pleasure of (a particular desire or activity).
example: I indulged in a large slice of cake.

definition: Noun meaning the action or fact of indulging.
Verb meaning make a photographic copy of (a document).
Noun meaning a machine that makes photocopies.
Verb meaning begin or continue a course of action.
Noun meaning an established or official way of doing something.
Verb meaning put forward (an idea or plan) for consideration.
example: I propose a toast to the couple.

definition: Noun meaning a plan or suggestion put forward for consideration.
Verb meaning follow (someone or something) in order to catch or attain them.
Noun meaning the action of pursuing someone or something.
example: He engaged in the pursuit of happiness.

definition: Verb meaning say or do something to remove the doubts or fears of (someone).
example: She tried to reassure her worried mother.

definition: Noun meaning the action of reassuring someone.
Verb meaning use or put in the place of (another person or thing).
Noun meaning the action of replacing someone or something with another.
Verb meaning take away (a number or amount) from another.
Noun meaning the process of subtracting one number from another.
example: Subtraction is the reverse of addition.

definition: Verb meaning forcibly put an end to.
Noun meaning the action of suppressing something.
Noun meaning the gathering together of something.
Verb meaning gather together or acquire an increasing number or quantity of.
Adjective meaning increasing or increased in quantity, degree, or force by successive additions.
example: The cumulative effect of the changes.

definition: Noun meaning a small alteration or movement made to achieve a desired fit, appearance, or result.
example: I made a few adjustments to the settings.

definition: Verb meaning alter or move (something) slightly in order to achieve a desired result.
example: You need to adjust the mirror.

definition: Adjective meaning able to be adjusted.
example: The chair has an adjustable height.

definition: Noun meaning the recognition and enjoyment of the good qualities of someone or something.
example: I showed my appreciation for the help.

definition: Verb meaning recognize the full worth of.
Adjective meaning feeling or showing gratitude or pleasure.
example: She was highly appreciative of the gift.

definition: Noun meaning a connection or cooperative link between people or organizations.
Verb meaning connect (someone or something) with something else.
example: I associate the smell with my childhood.

definition: Noun meaning the quality of being authentic.
example: The authenticity of the painting was questioned.

definition: Verb meaning prove or show (something) to be true or genuine.
Adjective meaning of undisputed origin; genuine.
Noun meaning a curved part of a road, river, etc.
Verb meaning mold or move (something) into a curve or angle.
example: She bent the wire into a circle.

definition: Adjective meaning curved or angled.
example: The door was bent out of shape.

definition: Noun meaning the act or process of comparing two or more people or things.
example: There is no comparison between the two teams.

definition: Verb meaning estimate, measure, or note the similarity or dissimilarity between.
example: Compare this photo with the original.

definition: Adjective meaning able to be compared.
example: The two situations are not really comparable.

definition: Noun meaning the power to influence or direct people's behaviour or the course of events.
example: He lost control of the car.

definition: Verb meaning determine the behaviour or supervise the running of.
Adjective meaning determined by a particular person or factor.
Noun meaning a spoken or written account of a person, object, or event.
example: Give a brief description of the job.

definition: Verb meaning give a detailed account in words of (someone or something).
Adjective meaning serving to describe something.
Noun meaning disturbance or problems which interrupt an event, activity, or process.
Verb meaning interrupt (an event, activity, or process) by causing a disturbance or problem.
Adjective meaning causing or tending to cause disruption.
Noun meaning a state of extreme physical or mental fatigue.
Verb meaning drain (someone) of their physical or mental resources.
Adjective meaning extremely tired.
Noun meaning the action of travelling in or through an unfamiliar area in order to learn about it.
Verb meaning travel through (an unfamiliar area) in order to learn about it.
Adjective meaning relating to exploration or investigation.
Noun meaning the state of being exposed to contact with something.
Verb meaning make (something) visible by uncovering it.
example: The low tide exposed the sand.
persian: در معرض قرار دادن، افشا کردن

definition: Noun meaning an act of kindness beyond what is due or usual.
example: Can you do me a favour?

definition: Verb meaning feel or show approval or preference for.
Adjective meaning expressing approval; advantageous.
Noun meaning a person who flirts.
Verb meaning behave amorously without serious intent.
example: He was flirting with the waitress.

definition: Adjective meaning behaving in a way that suggests a playful sexual attraction.
Noun meaning the action or process of forgiving or being forgiven.
Verb meaning stop feeling angry or resentful towards (someone) for an offence, flaw, or mistake.
Adjective meaning able to be forgiven.
Noun meaning the action or state of being included among others.
example: The inclusion of all voices is important.

definition: Verb meaning comprise or contain as part of a whole.
Adjective meaning including all the services or items normally expected.
example: The fee is inclusive of all costs.

definition: Noun meaning a sign or piece of information that indicates something.
example: There was no indication of foul play.

definition: Verb meaning point out; show.
Adjective meaning serving as a sign or indication of something.
example: His silence was indicative of his guilt.

definition: Noun meaning the action of intruding.
Verb meaning put oneself deliberately into a place or situation where one is unwelcome or uninvited.
Adjective meaning causing disruption or annoyance through being unwelcome or uninvited.
Noun meaning the action of showing something to be right or reasonable.
example: What is your justification for this expense?

definition: Verb meaning show or prove to be right or reasonable.
Adjective meaning able to be shown to be right or reasonable.
Noun meaning a substance consisting of two or more substances mixed together.
example: A mixture of cement and water.

definition: Verb meaning combine or put together to form one substance or mass.
Adjective meaning consisting of various ingredients or elements.
Noun meaning resistance or dissent, expressed in action or argument.
example: The proposal met with strong opposition.

definition: Verb meaning actively resist or refuse to comply with.
Adjective meaning against something.
example: I am opposed to the idea.

definition: Noun meaning the state of having, owning, or controlling something.
example: He took possession of the house.

definition: Verb meaning have as belonging to one; own.
Adjective meaning demanding someone's total attention and love.
example: He became possessive towards his girlfriend.

definition: Noun meaning action or speech that makes someone angry.
Verb meaning stimulate or incite (someone) to do or feel something.
Adjective meaning causing annoyance, anger, or another strong reaction.
Noun meaning the process of making something pure.
Verb meaning remove contaminants from.
Adjective meaning not mixed or adulterated with any other substance or material.
Noun meaning a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.
Verb meaning cause (someone) to feel confused because something is difficult to understand.
persian: گیج کردن، به معما تبدیل شدن

definition: Adjective meaning feeling or showing confusion.
Noun meaning the amount or number of a material or abstract thing.
Verb meaning express or measure the quantity of.
example: It is hard to quantify the benefits.

definition: Adjective meaning able to be quantified.
Noun meaning the action or process of reinforcing or strengthening.
Verb meaning strengthen or support (an object or substance), especially with additional material.
Adjective meaning strengthened.
Noun meaning a story told about a past event remembered by the narrator.
example: His book is full of family reminiscences.

definition: Verb meaning indulge in enjoyable recollection of past events.
Adjective meaning tending to remind one of something.
example: The style is reminiscent of the 1920s.

definition: Noun meaning the action of returning a military attack or counter-attack.
Verb meaning make an attack or assault in return for a similar attack.
example: They retaliated with a bombing raid.

definition: Adjective meaning characterized by a desire for revenge.
Noun meaning the action of stimulating someone or something.
Verb meaning encourage interest or activity in (a person or animal).
Adjective meaning encouraging or full of new ideas.
Noun meaning the use of symbols to represent ideas or qualities.
Verb meaning be a symbol of (something).
Adjective meaning serving as a symbol.
